name: A Bloody Nightmare
description:
They just keep coming - it's a bloody nightmare! Destroy endless waves of zombies to survive in this simple top-down shooter.

Made in two weeks as a learning project. The title accurately describes both the content of the game and the process of making it.

Controls:
  • Arrow keys/WASD to move
  • Mouse to aim
  • Left click to shoot
  • Escape to pause
